title: How to Use the Nordic Ware Omelet Pan

steps.headline: Add the eggs and milk or water to a bowl.
Season with a sprinkle of salt and pepper.
Spray the microwave omelet pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Pour the egg mixture evenly between the two pan halves.
Microwave at medium power for 2 to 3 minutes or until the filling is partially set.
Remove the microwave oven pan from microwave oven.
Cook at medium power until the egg is set.
Remove the microwave omelet pan from the microwave oven.
Fold the pan over in half.
Turn out onto the serving plate.

text: Add the eggs and milk or water to a bowl.  Season with a sprinkle of salt and pepper.  Whisk until well combined.  Spray the microwave omelet pan with nonstick cooking spray.  Pour the egg mixture evenly between the two pan halves.  Microwave at medium power for 2 to 3 minutes or until the filling is partially set.  Remove the microwave oven pan from microwave oven.  Stir the egg mixture.  Add the omelet toppings.  Cook at medium power until the egg is set. About 1.5 minutes. Remove the microwave omelet pan from the microwave oven.  Fold the pan over in half.  Loosen omelet with a spoon.  Turn out onto the serving plate.
